author: sky.cactus
content: Specifically, that phase 1 shards are basically just mainnet test, not really useful.

author: djrtwo
content: It is correct that its just sharded data but incorrect that it is just a test

author: djrtwo
content: Sharded data couples quite well with L2 scalability techniques that scale with layer 1 data

author: djrtwo
content: So there will be a fee market to get bytes into this data availability machine and its not a just test in the way it describes in that article
